datasets.name: 7c59dd28
queryLines:
SELECT
  county,
  county_name,
  SUM(total_energy_production) AS total_energy_production
FROM cscie103_catalog_final.gold.daily_energy_report_secure
GROUP BY county, county_name
ORDER BY total_energy_production DESC;

datasets.name: a301f28c
queryLines:
SELECT
  *,
  TO_DATE(datetime) AS date,
  DATE_FORMAT(datetime, 'HH:mm:ss') AS time
FROM cscie103_catalog_final.bronze.train;
